action_details: For this emergency, we will require 5 doctors to ensure effective response. The allocation plan is as follows: Doctor 1 and Doctor 2 will be assigned to provide immediate first aid and stabilization of critical patients. Doctor 3 and Doctor 4 will assist with triage and initial assessments, while Doctor 5 will oversee the overall scene management and coordination with other emergency services. This allocation ensures a balanced response to meet the medical needs of the injured individuals.
